title: Ticket #3212: Set Globus threading mode to single-threaded
description:
Depending on the environment variables, Globus can be set to either single-threaded (default) or multi-threaded mode. The multi-threaded mode would be fairly disastrous if accidentally set in Condor, causing lock-ups or crashes if mixed with the forking mode.

Just in case, we should explicitly turn off threading. There's no safe use case where the end-user will want to enable it for Condor.
